description: Gets a Private DNS zone. Retrieves the zone properties, but not the virtual networks links or the record sets within the zone.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

private_zone_name.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
